parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the diagnostic metric set.

parameters.name: MetricIds
parameters.description: The IDs of diagnostic metrics. You can specify up to 100 diagnostic metric IDs.

parameters.name: MetricSetName
parameters.description: The name of the diagnostic metric set.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource.

Default value: instance.
